title: Business news live: Pound value jumps as EU says Brexit deal 'still possible'
text:
The pound jumped against the euro this morning after the EU's chief negotiator said that it was still possible this week, despite it becoming "more difficult to reach an agreement.

Sterling rose 0.5 per cent against the single currency as Michel Barnier told reporters in Luxembourg: "Even if an agreement will be difficult - more and more difficult, to be frank - it is still possible this week."
